meanings.definition: The time when night begins to fall.
meanings.sent1: As the nightfalls, the stars start to twinkle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy the peaceful atmosphere when nightfalls in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: During the nightfalls, the sleepy town comes alive with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent4: The nightfalls like a soft blanket, covering the world in darkness.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nightfalls never fails to mesmerize me.

meanings.definition: The occurrence of darkness at night.
meanings.sent1: The nightfalls brought a sense of calm and quiet to the city streets.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to stay indoors when nightfalls, as it can get quite dark outside.
meanings.sent3: The nightfalls cast shadows that seem to dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: In the depth of nightfalls, the world seems to hold its breath.
meanings.sent5: The nightfalls cloak the world in a mysterious veil of darkness.

meanings.sent1: The nightfalls signaled the end of another day filled with adventures.
meanings.sent2: We watched in awe as the nightfalls painted the sky in shades of purple and pink.
meanings.sent3: The nightfalls seemed to sneak up on us, catching us by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The nightfalls gently whispered the arrival of a new evening.
meanings.sent5: The nightfalls marked the transition from day to night seamlessly.
